turns.text: And what happened is is that people wanted this shepherd to shepherd and protect And they bred dog that I th- its called an animals critical span which basically translates to how much shit will it take before it bites you That German shepherd the American German Shepherd here was such an unreliable animal that the American Seeing Eye Institute --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: because they would turn on th- on their handlers

turns.text: -- and bred to standard what they wanted an American German shepherd to be Which is very heavily now Skutzhund and Alsatian and its the Alsatian thats the kids dog Its just - you see them in Europe and theyre just lovely
